ADVERTS: Want to know the available commands? Type <cyan>/help<end>.
Need a little extra help? Type <cyan>/kit<end>.
Type <cyan>/map<end> for the island map link.
See where you are on the server map at: <lime>http://map.playrust.io/?104.46.99.115:28015<end>

MESSAGES.ADMINS LIST DESC: <cyan>/admins<end> <white>-<end> List of online <cyan>Admins<end> in the server.
MESSAGES.ADMINS ONLINE: There are <cyan>{admins} Admins<end> on the island.
MESSAGES.ADVERTS DESC: <cyan>/adverts<end> <white>-<end> Allows <cyan>Admins<end> to change the adverts interval ( i.g: /adverts 5 )
MESSAGES.CHECK CONSOLE: Check the console (press F1) for more info.
MESSAGES.JOIN MESSAGE: Exiled from <lime>{country}<end>, {username} has joined us on the island.
MESSAGES.MAP LINK: See where you are on the server map at: <lime>http://map.playrust.io/?104.46.99.115:28015<end>
MESSAGES.NO LANG: Error, <lime>{args}<end> language not supported or does not exist.
MESSAGES.NO RULES: Error, no rules found, contact the <cyan>Admins<end>.
MESSAGES.PLAYERS LIST DESC: <cyan>/players<end> <white>-<end> List of all players in the server.
MESSAGES.PLAYERS ONLINE DESC: <cyan>/online<end> <white>-<end> Shows the number of players online, plus a few server stats.
MESSAGES.PLUGINS LIST DESC: <cyan>/plugins<end> <white>-<end> List of plugins installed in the server.

DE: Spiel fair und missbrauche keine Bugs oder Exploits.
DK: Play fair og ikke misbruger af bugs / exploits.
EN: If a feature in a game is popular/effective, it is cheap.
If anything kills you at all, it is cheap.
If you are losing, it is because of lag.
If you are losing badly, it is because they are hacking.
This list brought to you by:
If you cant take a joke please leave the island
Smack-talk is good, griefing is bad, use common sence
ES: Evita el Spam en el chat.
Juega limpio y no abuses de bugs/exploits.
FR: Évitez le spam dans le chat.
Jouer juste et ne pas abuser des bugs / exploits.
IT: Fair Play e non abusare di bug / exploit.
NL: Vals spelen is ten strengste verboden.
Speel eerlijk en maak geen misbruik van bugs / exploits.
PT: Nao abuses de bugs ou exploits.
RO: Jucați corect și nu abuzați de bug-uri/exploituri!
RU: Играйте честно и не используйте баги и лазейки.
TR: Adil oynayın ve böcek / açıkları kötüye yok.
UA: Грати чесно і не зловживати помилки / подвиги.
